name: @sasvoth/circuits
description: Circom circuits for MACI voting proofs

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/VoteProof.r1cs pot_final.ptau build/VoteProof_0000.zkey
scripts.verify-setup: snarkjs zkey verify build/VoteProof.r1cs pot_final.ptau build/VoteProof_0000.zkey
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/VoteProof_0000.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.full-setup: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run verify-setup && npm run export-vkey
